comment: One of the worst teachers I have ever had. He never showed up for class, didn't answer any of my emails, forgot to meet with me when I requested to discuss class material, and just read from the power points, that most of the time he would forget to post. I would advise anyone to never take him. He doesn't care about his job teaching and it shows.

Smith is a working psychologist teaching for an extra pay check. Don't expect any help from him at all, he truelly doesn't know how  to give it. More than half our class was struggling and we all went to him to find out what we could do to get better grades. He said we were his worst class ever and that we needed to study harder 20+hrs wasnt enough
This class is super hard. The tests are hard and worded weird. He teaches everything off powerpoints. He doesnt curve grades or offere extra credit. I would not recommend him

Worst teacher ever, worst class ever. He missed classes and to "make it up to us" scheduled 4 tests during the last month of classes...all tests ended up being online. He responded to emails weeks after they had been sent...and didn't even post the most recent grades until i specifically asked him to an hour before the final!!!

What a waste of time and money. He missed almost half the semester's classes, read directly from book's powerpoints, could not remember what we did in the classes previous, wastes time, does not have a firm grasp of the material, and he DOES NOT RESPOND TO E-MAILS. He does not treat the class like it is his job.

Everyone keeps saying how hard he is, but if you pay attention and study, it's not hard.  I barely missed getting an A in his class.  Granted, I did study, but it's not supposed to be a slacker class.  The bottom line is, if you study, you will get a good grade. If you don't, you won't.  It's not his fault.  It's yours.

DONT TAKE HIM!!! his tests are awful, i studied for hours on end and still failed. he didnt help me when i i asked to meet in his office when i was having major trouble.  also, he will refuse to return the tests to you for studying purposes.  the grade is composed of only tests, and SONA research grade which amoungs to 5%.  comprehensive final.

Extremely hard class even though its intro! His lectures say 1 thing, book says another, and his tests something else! Im one of the few that got a B. And now have lost all interest in psyc. Tests are EXTREMELY detailed!

This Professor is awful he cannot even answer is own questions!! His tests are the hardest tests I have ever taken and he doesnt answer any e-mails and he only lectures with power points that dont help you study at all!! I made a C and that was trying my butt off! Dont take him unless you want a semester in hell!
This is a 3 hour course but had to study approx. 25-30 hours per week to pass test. Not very helpful when you ask for extra help.
